timeline.message:
Move Snapshot class.
Make AddImageTaskCallback an interface.

timeline.bodyText: I'd like us to call this StreamingAddImageTaskCallback. We can get that in another round.
timeline.author: rcordovano

+
+import java.util.List;
+import org.sleuthkit.autopsy.ingest.IngestStream;
+import org.sleuthkit.autopsy.corecomponentinterfaces.DataSourceProcessorCallback;

+/**
+ * Called on completion of the add image task.
+ */
+class DefaultAddImageTaskCallback implements AddImageTaskCallback {
